headline: Nvidia Physical AI Partnerships Shape Lab Robotics Industrial Automation Outlook
summary: Nvidia is expanding physical AI through new partnerships in lab robotics and industrial automation. The company is working with Opentrons Labworks Inc. to use Nvidia Isaac and Cosmos in automated laboratory experiments. An ongoing collaboration with Dassault Systèmes focuses on combining Virtual Twins with AI infrastructure for industrial use. Nvidia, traded as NasdaqGS:NVDA, is pushing further into real world AI applications as its technology moves beyond data centers and into laboratories...

content.title: Nvidia Physical AI Partnerships Shape Lab Robotics Industrial Automation Outlook

headline: Nvidia Reportedly Nears Record $20 Billion OpenAI Investment As Jensen Huang And Sam Altman Deny Reports Of Strained Partnership
summary: Jensen Huang-led Nvidia Corp (NASDAQ:NVDA) is reportedly planning to invest $20 billion in ChatGPT-maker OpenAI. Nvidia's Biggest Bet Yet On The AI Boom As part of OpenAI's latest funding round, Nvidia is close to finalizing a $20 billion investment in the AI startup, reported Bloomberg on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter. This investment, if completed, would mark Nvidia's single largest investment in OpenAI to date. Don't Miss: Missed Nvidia and Tesla? RAD Intel Could Be the Next
